dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3936116D] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2007 9:50 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3936116D] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Hello, For your review. Steve ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Added by system at Friday, May 4 2007 02:42 am X-MailFrom: barbara.steinberg@sulake.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri May 4 02:42:42 2007 Received: (qmail 27158 invoked by alias); 4 May 2007 07:42:42 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 27155 invoked from network); 4 May 2007 07:42:42 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 4 May 2007 07:42:42 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 4 May 2007 02:42:42 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 04 May 2007 02:42:42 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HjsR8-0000pC-9d for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 04 May 2007 02:42:42 -0500 Received: from punk.sulake.com ([193.64.35.198] helo=mail.sulake.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from barbara.steinberg@sulake.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HjsQv-000DBk-Vs for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 04 May 2007 02:42:30 -0500 Received: from localhost (mail.sulake.com [193.64.35.194]) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 7DB703FBFB; Fri, 4 May 2007 10:42:26 +0300 (EEST) Received: from mail.sulake.com ([193.64.35.195]) by localhost (punk [193.64.35.195]) (amavisd-new, port 10024) with ESMTP id 26090-03; Fri, 4 May 2007 10:42:24 +0300 (EEST) Received: from barbara (host-64-139-235-32.nctv.com [64.139.235.32]) (using TLSv1 with cipher RC4-MD5 (128/128 bits)) (No client certificate requested) by mail.sulake.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 087493FBCD; Fri, 4 May 2007 10:42:22 +0300 (EEST) Message-ID: <00a801c78e1f$9e32acc0$0201a8c0@barbara> From: "Barbara Steinberg" To: , Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE Date: Fri, 4 May 2007 03:41:19 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00A5_01C78DFE.136F0140" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2800.1409 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1409 X-Virus-Scanned: amavisd-new at sulake.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 May 2007 07:42:42.0550 (UTC) FILETIME=[CC443160:01C78E1F] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir/Madam, Whois and Network inquiries listed your names as the host of these sites, which are infringing on our copyright. habbizzimo.forumfree.net habbochat.forumfree.net habboretro.forumfree.net habboexperience.forumfree.net addresses 70.86.236.130 70.86.236.146 70.86.236.147 70.86.236.148 Network Whois record Queried whois.arin.net with "70.86.236.130"... OrgName: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. OrgID: TPCM Address: 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Address: Suite 110 City: Dallas StateProv: TX PostalCode: 75207 Country: US I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright for http://www.habbohotel.it. The owner of this copyright is Sulake IT Ltd. www.habbohotel.it is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and cheques. Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus: 'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake IT Ltd. All rights are reserved.' I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this website is not authorised by Sulake IT Ltd, the copyright owner, or the law. I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this under penalty of perjury. I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected. Yours sincerely, Barbara Steinberg Community Safety Assistant Manager Sulake Corporation MIME element (text/html)
 
Dear Sir/Madam,

Whois and Network inquiries listed your names as the host of these sites, which are infringing on our copyright.

Network Whois record

Queried whois.arin.net with "70.86.236.130"...

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com
Internet Services, Inc.  
OrgID:      TPCM 
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Address:    Suite 110 
City:       Dallas 
StateProv:  TX 
PostalCode: 75207 
Country:    US


I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.habbohotel.it. The owner of this copyright is
Sulake IT Ltd.

www.habbohotel.it is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for
teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is
represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in
all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by
the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as
credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and
cheques.

Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this
website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake IT Ltd. All
rights are reserved.'

I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorised by Sulake IT Ltd, the copyright owner, or the
law.

I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury.

I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected.

Yours sincerely,

Barbara Steinberg
Community Safety Assistant Manager
Sulake Corporation

MIME element (text/plain)
